title.rendered: INTECH’s OT Cybersecurity expertise will help in securing the Process Control Network at one of the largest petrochemical complexes in the Middle East

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]INTECH will be performing a major OT Cybersecurity improvement drive including upgrades for ICSS hardware, IT/OT networks, and system virtualization for a major petrochemical complex in the Middle East.

This project is another important addition to an increasing OT Cybersecurity project footprint in the Middle East that includes winning a project recently for helping a major Oil & Gas Company in the Middle East improve its OT Cybersecurity posture by securing its OT Networks.

The client for this project, a major Petrochemical company, faced increasing OT vulnerabilities arising from discontinued vendor support & aging existing systems and sought the services of an OT cybersecurity services company with extensive expertise & experience in the complete lifecycle of OT systems design & upgrades.

INTECH’s OT cybersecurity expertise, regional presence, and experience with OT systems at the said petrochemical complex were instrumental in winning this project.

INTECH will be upgrading the client’s infrastructure to the latest hardware, software, and applications – compliant with their cybersecurity requirements. The ICSS hardware includes upgrades to OEM systems & servers as well as SCADA migration. Another part of the infrastructure upgrade covers Alarms & Events systems and industrial data applications, migrating them to newer and more secure hardware. INTECH will also secure the server room with an improved fire suppression & protection system and industrial AC.

INTECH’s services cover the implementation of a Cybersecurity Management System, IT Systems’ Virtualization, APC applications, and web application firewalls.

About INTECH OT Cybersecurity

INTECH’s OT Cybersecurity expertise is built on deep-rooted knowledge and over 30 years of experience with complete lifecycle of OT systems design, deployment, management, and upgrades. INTECH’s multi-disciplinary teams of experts, with extensive experience on systems from leading OT system vendors, are helping some of the largest industrial organizations towards a secure digital transformation.

We can help you capture maximum advantage from enhanced connectivity by strengthening the cybersecurity posture of your critical infrastructure & industrial systems through a combination of consolidated visibility & risk management, round-the-clock anomaly & threat detection, OT Network segmentation, and OT systems & network hardening. Our global partnership with leading OT Cybersecurity firms makes sure that our solutions are deployed speedily and integrated seamlessly without any complications.

For more information, please visit: https://www.intechww.com/digital/ot-cybersecurity/

About INTECH

INTECH Process Automation is a globally renowned system integrator and industrial automation company. For nearly 30 years we have helped major oil & gas companies solve their most pressing issues of instrumentation, control, and electrical automation.

INTECH’s diversiﬁed automation solution portfolio, technical skills, knowledge, and expertise on equipment from all major OEMs, and our asset-application speciﬁc approach to solution design are what differentiates us from a typical system integrator.

As the world moves towards Industry 4.0, we move along with it and since late 2016, we have focused on building up our expertise on Industrial IoT and related digitalization solutions. We are gradually shifting from a project-based solution provider to a partnership-based solution provider. We have started working closely with our technology and platform partners as well as clients to build long-term relationships where we work together to solve problems and provide solutions that are cost-efficient, time-efficient, and bring the best of what everyone can offer.

For more information, please visit: www.intechww.com[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
